meanings.definition: A waterproof cloth or fabric treated with oil to make it resistant to moisture.
meanings.sent1: I spread out the oilcloths on the picnic table to protect it from the rain.
meanings.sent2: The oilcloths on the kitchen table were easy to wipe clean after the messy meal.
meanings.sent3: The oilcloths danced in the wind like colorful sails on a tiny boat.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like oilcloths, repelling any negativity that came her way.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the oilcloths reminded him of his childhood adventures in the rain.

meanings.definition: A tablecloth made of oilcloth material.
meanings.sent1: The bright red oilcloths added a cheerful touch to the outdoor dining area.
meanings.sent2: She carefully folded the oilcloths after the party, ready to reuse them next time.
meanings.sent3: The oilcloths on the table whispered secrets to each other when no one was looking.
meanings.sent4: His words were like oilcloths, covering up the truth with a shiny surface.
meanings.sent5: The oilcloths gleamed in the sunlight, making the whole room feel brighter.
